messages.message:
Hi team - not sure if this is the right forum for this but I wanted to know if we have done anything similar to the below for other customers? BofA is asking if this is possible:

*Use Case: Real-time service to provide response in the service call for when the customer is uploading a document*
1. Customer will submit a document
2. Instabase will classify the document (and possibly extract the year) to ensure they are submitting the correct document. 
3. If document is incorrectly classified, a real time response will be sent to customer notifying them to upload the correct document/year-form
1 & 2 i know we can do but what would we need to know/advise in order to do no. 3?

There is also an ask to see if this use case can also provide the feedback of the image quality — I believe with the help of word level confidence scoring we can do that to indicate whether the document being uploaded by the customer is of useable quality for Instabase.

@Ozge @hannah @Anant @Scott Day - if this is doable, how would this be packaged to BofA? Would it be an out of the box solution tied to consumption pricing?

BofA wants me to provide them with pricing/infra requirements (by EOW :woozy_face:) so they can budget this for their 2022 budget but don’t know what line to cross yet regarding licensing
+ @hannah so that it's in my radar
@Nithin @Hari did something similar for Standard Chartered. But that use case involves only classification
Is there a way to use what we did for SC and Blend to incorporate this use case?
Can we chat sometime to understand the use case and documents we need to classify?
Sure @Balaram - I’ll find time on your calendar
please put me in that too
Real time response can be sent using sync api. Please include me in the call, would like to understand the usecase/document.
